greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - x^(2*k+1))^k.
comment: The side effect of this calculation is a formula: Integral_{x=0..infinity} exp(-3*x)/(x*(1-exp(-2*x))^2) - 1/(4*x^3) + 1/(4*x^2) - exp(-x)/(24*x) = log(2)/6 + log(A)/2 - 1/24, where A = A074962 is the Glaisher-Kinkelin constant.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Vaclav Kotesovec, A method of finding the asymptotics of q-series based on the convolution of generating functions, arXiv:1509.08708 [math.CO], Sep 30 2015
maple: seq(a(n), n=0..60);  # after _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 17 2015
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 10 2015
